casebody.data:
BARROWS, Respondent, v. NEW YORK CENT. & H. R. R. CO., Appellant. (Superior Court of Buffalo,

General Term.

July, 1895.) Action by Alfred W. Barrows against the New York Central & Hudson River Railroad Company.

No opinion. Judgment and order appealed from affirmed, with costs. WHITE, J., does not sit in this case.
